title: Season 5 rewards - dates and restrictions
body:
So Jeffrey lin was throwing this idea around of not giving rewards to banned or restricted players.  

Is that still a thing?  I got restricted due to a horrific run of ever increasing  dcs (copper was stuffed and telstra has since fixed) but on the off chance i hit silver do i miss out on rewards because of my (now lifted) restriction?

And when does season officially end?

replies.body:
_"Two, players that have received a few Low Priority Queues will still be eligible for Ranked Rewards because we do not want to punish players who may have gotten a few queues due to ISP or hardware issues"_ - Riot Lyte

[Source.](http://ask.fm/RiotLyte/answer/131867181506)
"We are back pedaling our decision because this was a test to see how much backlash we would actually receive due to what was said" - Translation
